en: [Letter] 1803 Jun 27, Frankfort, Kentucky [to] Archibald Roane, Nashville, Tennessee / James Garrard

This document is a letter dated June 27, 1803 from James Garrard, governor of Kentucky to the governor of Tennessee, Archibald Roane. The purpose of the letter is the request the apprehension and delivery of Robert Wiley, who has been charged with a felony in that state.
